title: The Journalist
creator_credit: New South Wales Film Corporation, Pom Oliver and Michael Thornhill
brief_description: Follow the turbulent fortunes of Simon Morris, a top reporter and feature writer for a major daily newspaper. The newspaper is just a background to Simon’s lifestyle, particularly his relationship with women. Stars Jack Thompson, Elizabeth Alexander and Sam Neill.
creator_credit_for_label: New South Wales Film Corporation, Pom Oliver and Michael Thornhill
